Class HangmanGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • HangmanGame

  • public class HangmanGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that contains the behavior of the Hangman game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Character> incorrect
      List of incorrect Characters that have been guessed
      private char[] outputWord
      The changing output that is shown as the user guesses letters
      private int untilDeath
      How many wrong guesses until death
      private java.lang.String wordToGuess
      The word that the user has to guess

      • guess

        public boolean guess(char guess)
        The method called when the user guesses a letter. A check is made to see if the letter is in the word, based on this all other instance variables are updated accordingly.
        Parameters:
        guess - The guessed letter
        Returns:
        A boolean telling whether the letter is in the word or not
